title: Valance, 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: weft ikat in 1\2 twill
description: Wide valance with bands of solid blue and ochre, pink and beige weft ikat. Same fabric used as part of the facing on the back of the valance. valance is bound with plain weave tape.

tombstone.epitaph:
Valance, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: weft ikat in 1\2 twill. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-323.
